price: (3) Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
